name: The Law of Attraction
description:
Eureka! Find yourself encaptured in the middle of a mad scientists experiment, helping them unravel the mysteries of the world and life.  Capture ghost doggos, harness lightning, and and unravel the unknown in this point-and-click inspired game. Who knows what you may find while exploring this quaint Victorian Lab!

Corrin Coffey: music & sound design

Heather Ruszkowski: visuals & writing

Justin Kyle Torres: programming & project management

Submission for the Summer Slow Jams 2022
